name: Room Builder (Giant Boar)
description:
Sit back, enjoy the jazz and design your own room in Room Builder. Assemble your space from a range of furniture options, and decorate as you like

Controls:
  • Left Click to place an object
  • Right Click to delete an object
  • R to rotate

This game was made in only 5 days by Max Patteson, Arron Green, Brenna Syrad, Roman Smith, Zack Taylor and Haven Shelley for Game Anglia's 2023 Jam
